data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module builds upon Lingua::EN::Tagger for its core
    functionality, but all language-specific aspects are redefined, so
    that it will work with German lexical resources. The namespace
    parallels that of Lingua::EN::Tagger, because of the similar
    interface, architecture and functionality, yet it will remain unique
    among German projects. Since the Lingua::DE:: namespace already
    exists for other German-related projects, I wish to simply add mine
    to the list without introducing new top- or secondary- namespaces.
